gpt_comment: [FULL] All accessible weather sources align with the baseline for Paris. Meteoblue indicates an average of 26.1°C (79°F), which matches the baseline's high of 25°C and no rain. Perfect weather to enjoy a lazy day in a Parisian café, maybe even spot a bumblebee or two.
